overview: Living in an estate on the shores of Lake Geneva, Lord Byron is visited by Percy and Mary Shelley. Together with Byron's lover Claire Clairmont, and aided by hallucinogenic substances, they devise an evening of ghoulish tales. However, when confronted by horrors, ostensibly of their own creation, it becomes difficult to tell apparition from reality.
tagline: Conjure up your deepest, darkest fear... now call that fear to life.
cast: Gabriel Byrne|Julian Sands|Natasha Richardson|Myriam Cyr|Timothy Spall
